Yevtushenko, prompted these considerations of the role of poets in social-cultural-political progress in general and in a particularly spectacular fashion in Russia. Nonetheless, for centuries Russian poets have been harassed, persecuted, and punished<a class=\"more-link\" href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/2017/04/13/lukomorye-poets-pave-the-road-to-the-golden-age/\">[Read More…]</a></p>\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</div><!-- /.entry -->\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class=\"recent-meta\">\n\t\t\t\t<span>by <a href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/author/gaither-stewart/\" title=\"Posts by Gaither Stewart\" rel=\"author\">Gaither Stewart</a></span> <span class=\"separator\">—</span>                \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span><a href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/2017/04/13/lukomorye-poets-pave-the-road-to-the-golden-age/#comments\">1 comment</a></span> <span class=\"separator\">—</span>\t\t\t\t<span><a href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/category/arts-literature/\" rel=\"category tag\">Arts/Literature</a></span>\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- /.post-meta -->\t\n  \n\t\t</div><!-- /.post-content -->\n\t\n\t\t<div class=\"clear\"></div>\n\n\t</div><!-- #post-12389 -->\n\n\t<div id=\"post-12387\" class=\"post-12387 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-kashmir\">\n\n\t \t<div class=\"post-thumb\"><a href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/2017/04/13/kashmir-election-balloon-deflated/\" title=\"Kashmir: Election “Balloon” Deflated!\"><img src=\"https://i2.wp.com/www.countercurrents.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/kashmir-protest.jpg?resize=200%2C150&amp;ssl=1\" alt=\"Kashmir: Election “Balloon” Deflated!\" class=\"Thumbnail thumbnail loop \" width=\"200\" height=\"150\"></a></div> \t\t \n\t\t<div class=\"post-content\">\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.countercurrents.org/2017/04/13/kashmir-election-balloon-deflated/\" title=\"Permalink to Kashmir: Election “Balloon” Deflated!\" rel=\"bookmark\">Kashmir: Election “Balloon” Deflated!</a></h2>\n \n \t\t\t<div class=\"entry\">\n\t\t\t\t<p>&nbsp; Interaction</a></h2>\n \n \t\t\t<div class=\"entry\">\n\t\t\t\t<p>Note: Imaginary debate with opponents is a thought process adopted since ages by thinkers such as Sankara, Madhvacharya and many others to demolish prativada (counter arguments). Jayanti. It would be appropriate to take a re-look at Ambedkar’s idea of nationalism in the face of virulent Hindutva nationalism in India and also on the global context</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"right-col\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<ul>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a
